comment: I love Freddie Mercury. Maybe you didn't understand that I'm siding with Sacha and the desire for the R-rated tell-all that reveals the truth of the life he lived. He lived a wild life and paid the price for it. Instead, we get a PG-13 movie about how the band was always more important. And we don't get a Val Kilmer in the starring role.....
